titles: A reply to the Answer of the man of no name to His Grace the Duke of Buckingham's paper of religion, and liberty of conscience by G. C. ...
author: Care, George.

keywords: Buckingham, George Villiers, --  Duke of, 1628-1687. --  Short discourse upon the reasonableness of men's having a religion.
